articles.author: Ratna Bhushan
articles.title: Night delivery new war zone for online grocers; Instamart, Dunzo, Zepto, Blinkit all in race - The Economic Times
articles.description: Reliance-backed Dunzo is also making late-night deliveries.  We are seeing a decent part of our order volumes come up late in the night as well,  said Mrunmayi Oke, head of revenue at Dunzo.
articles.content: Grocery ecommerce platforms are looking to open up a new battlefrontnight delivery. Swiggy Instamart, the grocery delivery arm of restaurant delivery and search aggregator Swiggy, has extended grocer… [+4124 chars]

articles.title: Whistleblower Says Indian Government 'Agent' Was Placed in Twitter to Gauge Company's Plans - The Wire
articles.description: Twitter "simply lacked the fundamental abilities to hunt for foreign intelligence agencies and expel them on their own", Peiter Zatko told the US Senate on Tuesday.
